caption:
When what we need are little treats,
To get us through the day,
Make yourself a Yule Mule
To make your heart say, “Yay!” 

Grab a cup and fill it up
With ginger beer half way.
Then add a dash of grenadine 
And all will be OK. 

Don’t forget your lime wedge
Because a garnish is so nice. 
We think you’ll really like it – 
Enough to have it twice!

Try out this seasonal mocktail recipe by our friends at @nursesinspirenurses! 

Happy holidays! We hope you find time to take a well-deserved rest this month.
